title: Client-reported challenges and opportunities for improved antiretroviral therapy services uptake at a secondary health facility in Ghana
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Emmanuel Manu, Joshua Sumankuuro, Mbuyiselo Douglas, Fortress Yayra Aku, Prince Owusu Adoma, Gideon Kye-Duodu
